original_title: The Democrats go ‘Trump lite’ in latest plan to save democracy | CNN Politics
article_summary: California Governor Gavin Newsom, with the support of former President Barack Obama, is adopting a more aggressive approach against President Donald Trump, leveraging government mechanisms to counteract Trump's redistricting efforts in Texas. This strategy involves using humor and social media to counter Trump's tactics, and setting up a statewide referendum to potentially gain five House seats for Democrats. The underlying message is that Democrats must fight back against the perceived anti-democratic tendencies of the Republican Party.</s>
